entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
